subject: Vulnerability with the HUSKY plugin
preview: @rica - can you update alerts to just support@

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli marked as Closed
Workflow **Vulnerability assigned to Manuel** was triggered

full_threads.body: @rica - can you update alerts to just support@

Hello Andy, We are writing to you today to notify you about a security
vulnerability
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWukL6eYjGRlUZGKIx7PMBk87YT9LVd3xZq0-2BXwbs86pDyMEEk5FaLuRl1htMIrWhdhmbcjvSd-2BM2va1vNfo58OuM-3DmnLC_tre2UAHwEmECmL-2B5jr3qwRPQT9rQca20tnmpMgYY87eKKpACJwi4BGS0cfk8w6xvyxuiP8JH3Zs052bSi2ijPgQUISxBT6kFhQosZNYF1AVPTgfJJ8SBRhGz1LlgXnhmHVLCfvWPbrf1d4w-2BorfS3SGHbJuWXIxDJW9ebkCvLy3jjbQEBSX3QyG-2BeH8hzStcomC0Yn00rV1fuPIjBdTwIsuSRKtwbFAcAI7ll6HK3vcbLgX9MxfHFK0qQmrSQkWH>
discovered in the *HUSKY* plugin. We detected the plugin on one or more
of your websites:

• acouflor
• designtiles

*You can ignore this message if you have already updated HUSKY to the
latest version or have it set to update automatically.*

The plugin has a vulnerability that makes it possible for *unauthenticated
visitors* to perform local file inclusion
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWuvv5Fr-2F3EoZ9tc3J-2FLmj01tdEP5joloeHyTr8NQvo8z0rsmnmyHq61Mju36tfWPy-2FQ7g80bpfJYTi8wj1bpgBuYV0IqQ-2BnqDH5bNlDJuvwLdK6DAXIs42OY-2BRI69v7DEuBctVHekoCHYscXAA2aM2c8nIkdnGxLEaS3lk9Zjz1LOnbDORKzfzLEpvL71uzoPLv0UmXaNcmw6wKtR6NaE-2FOc-3D8IrR_tre2UAHwEmECmL-2B5jr3qwRPQT9rQca20tnmpMgYY87eKKpACJwi4BGS0cfk8w6xvCh4FAUUJX9NZTvyVJBHUw-2BZeTk4cLUSqTJPXu-2Bb5T4lxTlHL180U3wQmdWZPgyc8nINe-2BX0f2aPagAEBrdJnQl-2BuFsvSca2BDbJ8l1kFEU9UcQZft19QoYFVGpXr7UaPx5NDMWGHbZ-2BokPCW0kiLcttof3F-2FGdpIDEiO8-2FdxL0p6du3-2Fz3ctxUJ0DhWCPlmO>,
potentially leading to remote code execution
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWusCgiFMU6Fk5Q83U6Bsa0iCAtYxZqekYxAciEFQZTX7U6N2xfhoLxxQzMlkl7f77hA-3D-3D0QcX_tre2UAHwEmECmL-2B5jr3qwRPQT9rQca20tnmpMgYY87eKKpACJwi4BGS0cfk8w6xv0UQa1uuN9g6iyy96w8y6wY2uhgae9LgsON-2FT0aMQHytagNWTk8MM4LuT-2FM3t91m5VaFPBf9-2BfMXft-2BKRHySUTAtp9ErKfdvVuT2zNCEF48mmAEZRPkv9EEwQaqfQmA6F3RRDlONsuScXEZ5e6v2vxJp2vuML1vkEUxQdRvEBV2osW70MIkrowlCH-2BRm2QP7n>
.

This vulnerability affects versions before 1.3.6.6. We recommend updating
this plugin immediately to the latest version. To update, log in to
MyKinsta
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWuqfnKhH4mQmF-2FbsgKxDIHqo-3Drrxo_tre2UAHwEmECmL-2B5jr3qwRPQT9rQca20tnmpMgYY87eKKpACJwi4BGS0cfk8w6xvj9Rt2oJN0l-2FWxmftIfoXVUlgUoDS67XcVXxzFKmGiQW-2FNWfS8Sz2rFWqGahMpbHEOf4myv1oo817rhYDJLiTnsxycD-2F3Lj3NXIVnNYQ457ZswZxoOJRcJLGlX-2BJmjzOWFyP1JfDMDCQTk6aCP6vcOSBBf9MfzkPyfjMCoyU5AyGf8O7MH4PSRREaqGiqzIbG>
and go to WordPress sites > *site name* > Plugins and themes > Installed
plugins > HUSKY, and click the "Update" button.

To check all sites in your account for plugin updates, go to "WordPress
sites" and click the "Plugins" tab. That will list all the plugins
installed across all of your sites. A number greater than zero in the
"Updates" column means an update is available. (There's also a "Themes" tab
allowing you to update all themes installed on your sites.)

We detected this vulnerability on March 12th, 2025, at 1:44 PM UTC, but
due to the time difference between scanning for vulnerabilities and sending
notifications, you may have already updated the plugin.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Thank you for being a Kinsta client!
